section1.title: 1. Basic Information
section1.description: Let's start with some basic information about you.

section2.title: 2. Goals and History
section2.description: Let's understand your goals and background.

section3.title: 3. Health and Digestion
section3.description: Information about your health and digestive system.

section4.title: 4. Eating Behavior and Routine
section4.description: Information about your daily eating habits.

section5.title: 5. Food Preferences and Aversions
section5.description: Let's understand your food tastes and preferences.

section6.title: 6. Cheat Meals
section6.description: Information about your preferences for cheat meals.

section7.title: 7. Macronutrients and Meal Composition
section7.description: Information about how you organize your macronutrients.

section8.title: 8. Training and Lifestyle
section8.description: Information about your physical activities and routine.

section9.title: 9. Sleep and Stress
section9.description: Information about your sleep and stress levels.

questions.email: Please provide your email to receive your personalized nutrition plan
questions.acompanhamento_anterior: Have you previously worked with a nutritionist or personal trainer?
questions.dieta_anterior: Have you followed a diet before?
questions.tempo_seguiu_plano: How long were you able to follow the plan?
questions.meta_especifica: Do you have a specific weight goal, body fat percentage, or deadline to achieve your goal?
questions.competicoes: Have you participated or plan to participate in competitions (e.g., bodybuilding)?
questions.data_competicao: When was or will be the competition?
questions.condicoes_saude: Do you have any health conditions? (e.g., PCOS, hypothyroidism, dysbiosis, gastritis, insulin resistance, etc.)
questions.medicamentos: Do you take any medications or supplements?
questions.intolerancias: Do you have any food intolerances or allergies?
questions.dificuldade_digestao: Do you have difficulty digesting any foods?
questions.inchaço_abdominal: Do you often experience abdominal bloating?
questions.inchaço_detalhes: At what time of day and after which foods?
questions.azia_detalhes: How frequently and in what situations?
questions.gases_detalhes: At what times of the day?
questions.desconforto_refeicoes: Do you often experience discomfort after meals?
questions.desconforto_detalhes: How frequently and after what types of meals?
questions.sonolencia_refeicoes: Do you feel drowsy after meals?
questions.queda_energia: Do you feel a lack of energy or decreased physical/cognitive performance after eating?
questions.queda_energia_detalhes: After which meals or types of food?
questions.exames_recentes: Have you had recent lab tests?
questions.exames_resultados: Can you share the main results?
questions.quantidade_refeicoes: How many meals do you typically have per day?
questions.refeicoes_frequentes: Which meals do you have most frequently?
questions.horarios_fixos: Do you have fixed meal times?
questions.quais_pula_refeicoes: Which meals do you skip and why?
questions.detalhes_jejum: What type? How many hours? How often?
questions.horario_fome: At what time of day do you feel most hungry?
questions.compulsao: Do you experience episodes of binge eating?
questions.detalhes_compulsao: In what situations and with which foods?
questions.fome_emocional: Do you experience episodes of emotional eating?
questions.detalhes_fome_emocional: How often and in what context?
questions.bebe_refeicoes: Do you typically drink liquids during meals?
questions.bebidas_adocadas: Do you consume sweetened drinks like juices, sodas, or energy drinks?
questions.bebidas_zero: Do you consume zero-calorie drinks (diet soda, teas sweetened with stevia, etc.)?
questions.tipo_cafe: With sugar, sweetener, milk, or black?
questions.estimulantes: Do you use other stimulants (pre-workouts, thermogenics, energy drinks)?
questions.tipo_alcool: Which brands and types? (wine, beer, gin, spirits, etc.)
questions.detalhes_cigarro: For how long? How many per day?
questions.alimentos_gosta: Which foods do you really like and would like to keep in your diet?
questions.alimentos_evita: Which foods do you avoid or don't tolerate (due to taste, texture, or ideology)?
questions.cafe_manha_preferencia: Do you prefer sweet or savory breakfast?
questions.frutas_vegetais_preferidos: Which fruits and vegetables do you prefer?
questions.aversao_texturas: Do you have any aversion to certain textures or flavors (e.g. mint, coconut, cilantro, ginger)?
questions.paladar_alterado: Do you often experience altered taste, dry mouth, or bitter taste?
questions.nivel_apetite: How would you rate your appetite:
questions.consome_tofu: Do you eat tofu or plant-based protein?
questions.consome_leite: Do you consume milk and dairy products?
questions.preferencia_carne: Do you have a preference for any specific type of meat?
questions.dificuldade_carne_vermelha: Do you have difficulty digesting red meat?
questions.gordura_cozinhar: What type of fat do you typically use for cooking? (olive oil, butter, soybean oil, lard, coconut oil, etc.)
questions.azeite: Do you use olive oil regularly?
questions.quantidade_azeite: In what approximate amount per meal?
questions.oleo_coco: Do you use coconut oil or coconut products?
questions.frequencia_frituras: How often per week or per day?
questions.dia_refeicao_livre: On which day do you usually have it?
questions.preferencia_refeicao_livre: What do you like to eat during these meals?
questions.preferencia_agendamento: Do you prefer to have your cheat meal scheduled or decide in the moment?
questions.proteina_refeicoes: Do you include a protein source in all meals?
questions.gorduras_boas: Do you consume healthy fat sources?
questions.quais_gorduras_boas: Which ones (avocado, nuts, olive oil, egg yolk, coconut oil, etc.)
questions.carboidratos_frequentes: Which carbohydrates do you consume most frequently? Do you prefer whole grains or refined?
questions.dieta_manipulacao_carbo: Have you used a diet with carb manipulation (e.g., cycling)?
questions.preferencia_ciclo_carbo: Would you like to include carb cycling or maintain a linear pattern?
questions.pratica_atividade: Do you engage in physical activity?
questions.tipo_treino: Type of training (e.g., weight lifting, running, functional...)
questions.preferencia_alimentar_treino: Do you have food preferences for pre and post-workout?
questions.detalhes_alimentar_treino: What do you like or usually consume?
questions.horas_sono: How many hours do you sleep per night?
questions.dificuldade_dormir: Do you have difficulty falling asleep or wake up during the night?
questions.acorda_descansado: Do you wake up feeling rested?
questions.estresse_elevado: Are you in a period of high stress?
questions.estresse_afeta_alimentacao: Does stress affect your eating or sleeping?
questions.informacao_adicional: Is there any information you consider important that has not been addressed?
questions.preferencia_plano: Would you prefer a plan with more freedom or more detailed structure?
questions.pesar_medir: Are you willing to weigh and measure your food if necessary?

thankYou.title: Thank you for completing the questionnaire!
thankYou.description: We will analyze your responses and send your personalized nutrition plan soon.
thankYou.successTitle: Success! Your assessment has been submitted
thankYou.successDescription: Dr. Jackie has received your information and will be in touch soon.
thankYou.whatHappensNextStep1: Your assessment was sent directly to Dr. Jackie, who will personally review it.
thankYou.whatHappensNextStep2: She will create your personalized nutrition plan based on your answers.
thankYou.whatHappensNextStep3: Dr. Jackie will respond soon with your plan and next steps.
thankYou.thankYouTitle: Thank you for trusting Dr. Jackie's work!
thankYou.thankYouDescription: Your journey to better nutrition starts here. We're excited to help you achieve your goals!

validation.turnstileRequired: Please complete the verification before submitting.
validation.emailRequired: Please verify you're human to continue
